items.content_html: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.

items.content_html: Easy-Docs is a lightweight and intuitive real-time collaborative text editor designed for seamless document creation and editing. Built with modern web technologies, it enables multiple users to collaborate simultaneously with live updates. Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.
items.title: DharamveerSinghGrewal/easy-docs: Easy-Docs is a lightweight and intuitive real-time collaborative text editor designed for seamless document creation and editing. Built with modern web technologies, it enables multiple users to collaborate simultaneously with live updates. Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
